name: Ranger Tortoise's Quest
description:
This is a game where you play as a tortoise. 
You can fight using sword or bow (switch with Q)

Hold RMB to Aim while using the bow.
Ammo is limited. Friendly fire is possible. So be careful. 

Face the crocodiles and put the crosshair over their head to give them commands to follow you or stay. They won't fight while they are following you.

You win the game by escorting two crocodiles to the pond. 

The concept and ideas for the game are based on the 2D game "Turtle's quest" by orcdraco. (https://orcdraco.itch.io/turtles-quest)
